node.title: Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) - Part 2 - IDisposable
node.description: Implementing IDisposable correctly is ridiculously hard. A Disposable base class can make it easier. Using IDisposable in Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) really helps.

node.title: Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) - Part 1 - Overview
node.description: What really goes into using Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) in .NET. Base classes for INotifyPropertyChanged, INotifyDataErrorInfo, IDisposable and a lot more.
